pages.text: The ever-shaping and unceasing magic in the world and its skin has shaped things from nothingness to everything around us. $(br)It is the very definition of the unknown, and it has left a spark of its power in every living being, and sometimes in things beyond or below that.$(2br)One who knows and can harness this power may move this

spark, get it to glow brighter, or may even transform it into a shaping flame.$(br)However, this is not what the art of witchcraft is necessarily about. It is rather the beauty of this spark, expressing in things like the flowers of a witches garden, or the intoxicating scent of obscure fumes.$(2br)$(o)And a witch knows how to use all of it.$()
